# font(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the default font for text in this axis content.

## Declaration

```swift
func font(_ font: Font?) -> some AxisMark

```

## Parameters

- **font**: The default font to use in this axis content.

## Return Value

An axis content that uses the given default font for text.
title: font(_:)
